KnowledgeBase.Title: Example IntVector isObject 008
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions:
isType isIntegerVector isBitVector
isNumberVector isByteVector isIdentical
isObjectVector isPcodeVector isVector

Example.Description:
These examples check if the argument object is
a recognizable Analytic Information System Object.
If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Note: An Integer is not an Object.
